title: Strategic Planning and Organizational Performance Linkage: The Role of Learning Resources and Execution Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in business administration and basic understanding of organizational operations
context.additional_context: Focus on linking theory and practice through analysis of real organizational case studies

learning_goals: Students can explain the mediating effect of organizational learning on performance during strategic planning processes.
Students can analyze the impact of human resource/financial slack resources on strategic feasibility.
Students can design resource optimization strategies based on real-world case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
